deposit(bytes32,uint256).details: The value added must be in the same underlying asset as the position.

params.rayTokenId: - The unique id of the RAY token
params.value: - The amount to be deposited denominated in the smallest units                  in-kind. Ex. For USDC, to deposit 1 USDC, value = 1000000

params.rayTokenId: - The unique token id of the RAY

params._rayStorage: - The address of the RAY storage contract

params.beneficiary: - The address that will own the position
params.value: - The amount to be deposited denominated in the smallest units                  in-kind. Ex. For USDC, to deposit 1 USDC, value = 1000000

mint(bytes32,address,uint256).return: The unique token id of the new RAY token position

redeemAndWithdraw(bytes32,uint256,addres.details: Caller must be the 'true' owner of the token or RAY's GasFunder (Payer) contract

params.originalCaller: - Unimportant unless Payer is the msg.sender, tells                            us who signed the original message.

deposit(bytes32,uint256).notice: Adds capital to an existing RAY token, this doesn't restrict who          adds. Addresses besides the owner can add value to the position.

getTokenValue(bytes32).notice: Gets a RAY tokens current value

init(address).notice: Init contract by referencing the Eternal storage contract of RAY

mint(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Allows users to deposit ETH or accepted ERC20's to this contract and          used as capital. In return they receive an ERC-721 'RAY' token.

redeemAndWithdraw(bytes32,uint256,addres.notice: Withdraw value from a RAY token
